item.title: FUSING METADATA AND DERMOSCOPY IMAGES FOR SKIN DISEASE DIAGNOSIS
item.description: Weipeng Li*, Jiaxin Zhuang*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Wei-Shi Zheng. In Proceedings of the 20th International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging(ISBI), Lowa, USA, 2020. Abstract To date, it is still difficult and challenging to automatically classify dermoscopy images. Although the state-of-the-art convolutional networks were applied to solve the classification problem and achieved overall decent prediction results, there is still room for performance improvement, especially for rare disease categories. Considering that human dermatologists often make use of other information (e.

item.title: CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data
item.description: Jiaxin Zhuang*, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng In Proceedings of The 2nd International Conference on Medical Imaging with Deep Learning, London, United Kingdom, 2019 Abstract To date, it is still an open and challenging problem for intelligent diagnosis systems to effectively learn from imbalanced data, especially with large samples of common diseases and much smaller samples of rare ones. Inspired by the process of human learning, this paper proposes a novel and effective way to embed attention into the machine learning process, particularly for learning characteristics of rare diseases.

About Me

I am a 2nd year master student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. Currently, i am advised by Prof. Ruixuan Wang, Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang at iSEE-SYSU. I received my B.Sc. Degree from Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University in 07/2018. I was a research intern of Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab, advised by Prof. Liang Lin.

My research interest lie within deep learning for computer vision, particalurly in interpretability, imbalanced data and unsupverised learning, clustering.

News!!: I am seeking for Ph.D from 2021 Fall. Feel free to reach out to me if you are interested.

Research Interest

Computer Vision, Interpretability, Data imbalanced, Clustering, Unsurpervised learning.
